item.description:
Please join us for the 7th Annual Northeast Permaculture Convergence!

This year's host is Camp Epworth in High Falls New York. The full Convergence weekend will run from noon on Friday, July 22 noon until noon on Sunday, July 24.
  !!!!!!!!!!


Registration is now open for the 2011 Northeastern Permaculture Convergence!!!

The Northeastern Permaculture Community is invited to a full weekend of workshops, projects, and networking at Camp Epworth in High Falls, NY on July 22-24.

Please visit the official website http://northeastconvergence.wordpress.com/ to view the most updated schedule and to get your tickets!

Here's an overview of the whole event:

Friday Morning
Permaculture Site Tours!
Home and gardens of Dina Falconi & Tim Allen
Juniper Hill Farm, permaculture homestead of Andrew Faust & Adriana Magaña
Clove Valley CSA, local organic no-till vegetables
When: 9:00am - 12:00pm
Who: Open to the public

Friday & Sunday
Goal: Build & deepen the regional permaculture community.
When: Beginning Friday at 12:00pm
Who: Open to anyone who has a permaculture certificate or otherwise self-identifies as a permaculturist.
Details TBA on the website.

Saturday
Goal: Permaculture Festival! Celebrate, connect, and share permaculture with world!
When: All day Saturday, 9:00am - 11:00pm
Who: Open to the public
Workshops: Introduction to Permaculture, Wild Food & Medicinals, Transition Towns, Permaculture in Cuba, Urban Homesteading, and many more!
Hands-on Projects: Cob oven building, Forest garden care-taking, Water harvesting system installation
Permaculture Marketplace: Local organic food, books, plants, and other ecological and social justice-oriented products and services.
Family Pavilion: Art, music, and permaculture for kids.
And live local music to finish out the evening!

Cost is on a very affordable sliding scale. Apart from the amazing of array of sessions and activities that come with your ticket, the price also includes delicious meals suitable for vegetarians, vegans and meat-eaters. Camping in several woodland or field campsites is included as well.

Go here to register:

http://northeastconvergence.wordpress.com/
item.how_to_find_us: Go to the registration booth and sign in
item.name: 7th Annual Northeast Permaculture Convergence
